segments.text: Good morning , Star Airline . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to confirm a reservation , please.My name is Wang Lin . My flight is KF98 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . You are leaving for Berlin on July 23rd with Mr . Smith , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? I am afraid you have made a mistake , I am leaving on July 21st alone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sonry.So you are loaving on Duty 21st and your seat is in the business section .
segments.speaker: S1
